title: Enhancing App Development Practical Competencies: Picture Book Dictionary-Based Education for Elementary Cultural Literacy Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain 100 core vocabulary items of local culture with 90% accuracy through images and descriptions.
Learners can understand and apply cultural vocabulary bilingually (Korean/local language) in real-life contexts.
Learners can achieve over 80 points (out of 100) on a cultural literacy assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
